additionalOutput.accountName: =IF(%HTTPPANValidationUpdate% != null && %HTTPPANValidationUpdate:success% == true, %HTTPPANValidationUpdate:result:name%, IF(%HTTPPANValidationCreate% != null && %HTTPPANValidationCreate:success% == true, %HTTPPANValidationCreate:result:name% , null))
additionalOutput.errorMessage: =IF(%HTTPPANValidationUpdate:success% == true ||  %HTTPPANValidationCreate:success% == true , null ,(IF((%HTTPPANValidationUpdate% != null && %HTTPPANValidationUpdate:success% == false) , %HTTPPANValidationUpdate:errorMsg% + ": "+ %HTTPPANValidationUpdate:errorCode% , (IF((%HTTPPANValidationCreate% != null && %HTTPPANValidationCreate:success% == false), %HTTPPANValidationCreate:errorMsg% + ": "+ %HTTPPANValidationCreate:errorCode% ,"An internal Salesforce error has occurred. Please contact the Administrator.")))))
